q: these problems are correctable, Garcia insists. And time is on all these dogs' side. "Some say if a dog is bred to do something, you can't undo that," Garcia said. But to me, that's like saying if everyone in your family has always fought in a war, you're a warrior and you're destined to do this. Not true. Everyone's an individual. You can choose your own path in life. Same with dogs. The only difference is, they can't choose it. Colin Powell said he was concerned about what he characterized as a recent negative turn of Republican candidate John McCain 's campaign, such as the campaign's attempts to tie Barack Obama to former 1960s radical Bill Ayers . I think that's inappropriate. I understand what politics is about-- I know how you can go after one another, and that's good. But I think this goes too far, and I think it has made the John McCain campaign look a little narrow. It's not what the American people are looking for, he said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal. He later wore shoulder pads and thigh pads made by the company. The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal, Michael Vick said in a statement acquired by the Associated Press.
